template&lt; std::size_t N &gt;
struct overaligned_tag {};

template&lt; std::size_t N &gt;
inline constexpr overaligned_tag&lt;N&gt; overaligned{};
}}

This tag type indicates that the buffer of {{c|copy_from}} and {{c|copy_to}} is aligned to N.

{{par|N|the alignment in bytes the memory access may assume}}
